articles.description: Cochise County restaurants are participating in Arizona Restaurant Week for first time. Local business owners said they chose to participate because they see it as a chance to gain customers.
articles.content:
COCHISE COUNTY, Ariz. (KGUN) Nine Cochise County restaurants are participating in Arizona Restaurant Week for the first time.
